name: writeOutput
description:
Appends text to the page-output stream.
 This function writes to the page-output stream regardless of
 conditions established by the cfsetting tag.

params.name: string
params.description: A string, or a variable that contains one

params.name: encodeFor
params.description: CF2016+ Lucee5.1.0.8+ Wraps the result with an encodeFor function.

examples.title: Output the equivalent string as a variable
Using the encodeFor argument
examples.description: CF2016+ Passing in `html` to the `encodeFor` argument wraps the result with a call to encodeForHTML.
